common.title: Reown
common.toggleCursorEffect: Toggle the Houdini cursor smoke effect!

wallet.connectWalletDescription: Connect your wallet to start swapping
wallet.connectedWalletDescription: You can now start swapping tokens.
wallet.walletNotConnectedDescription: Please connect your wallet to continue

swap.title: Swap

toolTipInfo.standardDescription: Quickly swaps tokens using one main liquidity source. Ideal for speed and lower costs. Compatible with any token on any chain.
toolTipInfo.privateDescription: Uses multiple sources to protect transaction privacy, making it untraceable. Typically takes about 30 minutes for added security.

options.title: Options
options.useMoneroDescription: Private Swaps will route solely using Monero rather than Houdini Swap's default privacy tunnel. This may affect swap speed and cost.
options.disabledTooltip: {partner} partner is currently disabled. Please try a different one.

routes.title: Recommended Routes
routes.description: Choose the most efficient route for your transaction
routes.routeNotAvailable: Route not available for different recipient wallet
routes.refreshTimerTooltip: Routes refresh automatically when the timer ends.
routes.tooltipDifferenceTitle: This shows the difference between what you spend and what you receive — in USD.
routes.tooltipDifferenceDetail: You're spending <inUsd>${inUsd}</inUsd> and getting <outUsd>${outUsd}</outUsd>, which is a <percent>{percent}</percent> difference.
routes.tooltipDifferenceDisclaimer: USD values are calculated using third-party price feeds and may not reflect real-time volatility.

modal.tryDifferentSearch: Try searching with a different term

errors.insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance. You have {balance} {tokenName}, but you're trying to send {amount} {tokenName}. Also, make sure you have enough native to cover the gas fee
errors.pleaseSwitchNetwork: Please switch to the correct network
errors.transactionSubmissionFailed: Failed to submit transaction to network
errors.walletNotConnectedOrChainNotSelected: Wallet not connected or chain not selected

solana.jupiterSlippage: Jupiter swap failed due to slippage or price impact. Try adjusting the amount or try again later.
solana.jupiterLiquidity: Insufficient liquidity for this swap. Try a smaller amount or a different token pair.
solana.jupiterRoute: No valid route found for this swap. Try a different token pair or amount.
solana.whirlpoolInvalidTickArray: Whirlpool swap failed: Invalid tick array sequence. Try again with a smaller amount or different token pair.
solana.blockhashNotFound: Blockhash not found during simulation. Trying again.
solana.slippageToleranceExceeded: Slippage failure during simulation. Trying again.
solana.requireGteViolated: Swap instruction failure during simulation. Trying again.
solana.invalidAccountData: Token account validation failed. Please ensure the token account is properly initialized and has sufficient funds.
solana.tokenAccountNotFound: Token account not found. Please initialize the token account first.
solana.routeNotFound: No valid route found for this swap. Try a different token pair or amount.
solana.priceImpactTooHigh: Price impact is too high for this swap. Try a smaller amount.
solana.insufficientLiquidity: Insufficient liquidity for this swap. Try a smaller amount or a different token pair.
solana.whirlpoolInvalidAccountData: Whirlpool swap failed: Token account validation error. Please ensure your token account is properly initialized.
solana.whirlpoolInsufficientFunds: Whirlpool swap failed: Insufficient funds. Please ensure you have enough tokens for the swap.
solana.whirlpoolOverflow: Whirlpool swap failed: Arithmetic overflow. Try a smaller amount.
solana.tokenProgramInvalidAccountData: Token Program error: Invalid account data. This usually means the token account is not properly initialized or has incorrect permissions. Please try creating a new token account.
solana.tokenTransferInvalidAccountData: Token transfer failed: Invalid account data. This usually means the source or destination token account is not properly initialized or has incorrect permissions. Please ensure both accounts exist and are properly set up.
solana.insufficientFundsOrTokenAccountNotFound: Insufficient funds or token account not found.
solana.insufficientLamports: Insufficient funds for transaction. Please ensure you have enough balance.
solana.unknownProgramError: An unknown program error occurred. Please try again.

evm.rpcError: Internal JSON-RPC error. Please try again.
evm.headerNotFound: Block not found or node not synced. Please try again.
evm.stackLimitReached: Contract execution error: Stack limit reached.
evm.methodHandlerCrashed: Internal blockchain error. Please try again later.
evm.executionTimeout: Transaction execution timed out. Please try again.
evm.nonceTooLow: Invalid transaction sequence. Please try again.
evm.filterNotFound: Filter expired. Please refresh and try again.
evm.resourceNotFound: Requested resource not found or unavailable.
evm.resourceUnavailable: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
evm.transactionRejected: Transaction rejected due to validation failure.
evm.limitExceeded: Request limit exceeded. Please try again later.
evm.traceRequestsLimited: Debug requests are currently rate limited. Please try again later.
evm.transactionCostExceedsLimit: Transaction cost exceeds gas limit. Please increase gas limit.
evm.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your connection and try again.
evm.invalidRequest: Invalid request format. Please try again.
evm.logRangeLimited: Log request exceeds allowed block range (10,000 blocks).
evm.internalJsonRpcError: Internal service error. Please try again.
evm.disconnectAndReconnect: Something went wrong with your wallet connection. Please disconnect and reconnect your wallet
evm.chainSwitchError: Your connected wallet does not support {network} network. Please disconnect your current wallet and connect a wallet that supports {network}

ton.invalidSeqno: Invalid sequence number. Please try again
ton.accountNotFound: Account not found or not initialized

swap.transactionCompleted: Your transaction has been completed successfully

validation.invalidAddress: Oops! You inputted invalid recipient wallet. You must input a {chain} wallet address.
validation.noRouteSelectedDescription: Please select a route to continue
validation.addressRequiredDescription: Please enter a wallet address to continue

multiSwap.addMultiSwapButtonTooltip: Only on CEX flows, and on one route. Disabled if DEX chosen.
multiSwap.addSwapTooltip: Add a new swap to your order

orderDetails.title: Order Details
orderDetails.noOrderMessage: We couldn't find any order details with the provided information.
orderDetails.orderDestinationTagModalWarning3: If you do not include the correct tag, your funds may be lost and cannot be recovered.
orderDetails.orderDestinationTagModalDescription: This exchange requires that you tag the transaction properly inside the memo/tag/comment so that it routes into the correct wallet. For reference, memo/tag/comment are all different names for the same thing.
orderDetails.longerThanUsualModalDescription: We have noticed the order is taking slightly longer than usual today. We have received your funds and swap is currently in progess. If you need any further assistance contact our support please
orderDetails.transactionsSentToFromSmartContracts: Transactions sent To/From smart contracts are not accepted!

status.waitingStep: Waiting for deposit to be detected

qrCodeModal.title: Address QR Code (scan in your Wallet app)

footer.waitingForFunds: When funds are received this page will auto refresh to display your transaction progress

expiredCard.title: Order Expired
expiredCard.description: This order has expired. You can start a new trade or contact support if you believe this is an error.

failedCard.title: Order Failed
failedCard.description: This order has failed. Please try again or contact support if you believe this is an error.

refundedCard.title: Order Refunded
refundedCard.description: This order has been refunded. If you have not received your funds, please contact support.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.exchangeHeroDescription: The latest rate for the {from} to {to} exchange is 1 {from} ≈ {exchangeRate} {to}. Before proceeding with the {from}/{to} conversion, use our {from} to {to} exchange calculator to estimate the amount of Ethereum you'll receive. Simply enter the amount of Ethereum you'd like to swap, and our converter will provide an accurate rate. HoudiniSwap offers a fast, secure, and easy-to-use platform with no sign-up required for converting {from} to {to}. Exchange over 4,000 coins and tokens.
exchange.howToPairSwapDescription: Make your swap transactions by following the steps
exchange.howToPairStepOneDescription: Select {fromName} ({from}) in the "You Send" section. Enter the amount of {from} you wish to exchange.
exchange.howToPairStepTwoDescription: Select {fromName} ({from}) in the "You Send" section. Enter the amount of {from} you wish to exchange.
exchange.howToPairStepThreeDescription: To proceed with a fast & secure swap, send the required deposit. The exchange page will display the address where you should send the exact amount of Ethereum for the {from}/{to} swap.
exchange.howToPairStepFourDescription: After receiving your deposit, we will process the conversion. It may take some time, but once the swap is complete, your {to} will be sent to the provided wallet address.
exchange.whyHoudiniSwapStepOneDescription: HoudiniSwap allows you to trade cryptocurrencies without creating an account.
exchange.whyHoudiniSwapStepTwoDescription: Choose from thousands of different cryptocurrencies and trade between them with ease.
exchange.whyHoudiniSwapStepThreeDescription: Our support team is available around the clock to help with any questions or issues.
exchange.whyHoudiniSwapStepFourDescription: Full Control Over Your Assets Your crypto is directly transferred to your wallet & nothing is stored on our platform.
exchange.otherSwapsDescription: Simply enter the required amount in {fromName}, and let our {from} to {to} converter find an approximate rate.
exchange.laasBusinessTestimonySliceMessage_1:
#TransactFreely with @HoudiniSwap
 in their upcoming v3 launch! Houdini will
be supporting Arbitrum on v3
Just Houdini it
exchange.laasBusinessTestimonySliceMessage_2:
Houdini Swap V3 comes to Avalanche,
 simplifying cross-chain transactions for
 users. Congrats on the upgrade
@HoudiniSwap
exchange.laasBusinessTestimonySliceMessage_3:
Do you want to build a bridge to TON?
Then you are in the right place. Start the
safe process now. Don't waste time
@HoudiniSwap
exchange.laasBusinessTestimonySliceMessage_6:
We are happy to support @HoudiniSwap.
  Any THORChain-powered asset and more
 in one seamless UI.

global.title: HoudiniSwap: Make Private Transactions & Cross-Chain Swaps.
global.description: Experience secure crypto anonymity with HoudiniSwap. Explore private transactions, fast cross-chain swaps, and enhanced privacy for your digital assets.

default.title: HoudiniSwap: Make Private Transactions & Cross-Chain Swaps.
default.description: Experience secure crypto anonymity with HoudiniSwap. Explore private transactions, fast cross-chain swaps, and enhanced privacy for your digital assets.

anonymous.title: An Anonymous {tokenIn} to {tokenOut} Swap: Private Cross-Chain Transaction
anonymous.description: Swap {tokenIn} to {tokenOut} anonymously with HoudiniSwap. Ensure total privacy and cross-chain anonymity. Enjoy secure transactions, unstoppable speed, and stealth in every transaction.

lock.title: Swap {tokenIn} for LOCK: Secure, Private Cross-Chain Transfers
lock.description: Effortlessly convert {tokenIn} to LOCK with HoudiniSwap's private, cross-chain platform. Enjoy secure transactions, rapid trades, and total confidentiality.

default.title: Swap {tokenIn} for {tokenOut}: Private Cross-Chain with HoudiniSwap
default.description: Exchange {tokenIn} to {tokenOut} securely on HoudiniSwap. Enjoy private transactions and cross-chain swaps with lightning-fast execution and maximum privacy.

getApiAccess.title: Get HoudiniSwap API Access: Private Cross-Chain Tools.
getApiAccess.description: Request your HoudiniSwap API credentials for private cross-chain swaps. Integrate advanced privacy features and secure transactions for maximum freedom.

stakingDashboard.title: HoudiniSwap Staking Dashboard: Private Cross-Chain Staking.
stakingDashboard.description: Stake with confidence on HoudiniSwap's secure dashboard. Unlock private cross-chain rewards and enjoy confidential transactions on every swap.

history.title: HoudiniSwap Staking History: Secure Cross-Chain Records.
history.description: Explore your complete staking records with advanced privacy. Track cross-chain swaps, monitor transactions, and access confidential insights.

performance.title: HoudiniSwap Performance Metrics: Private Cross-Chain Rewards.
performance.description: Track your staking performance on HoudiniSwap's private cross-chain dashboard. View secure metrics, compare yields, and enjoy confidential crypto rewards.

exchange.title: Swap {from} to {to} | Houdini Swap
exchange.description: Privately swap {from} to {to} with no KYC required. Fast, secure, and compliant crypto exchange with the best rates.

analytics.title: HoudiniSwap Analytics: Private Cross-Chain Performance Metrics.
analytics.description: Explore HoudiniSwap's analytics dashboard. Track private cross-chain transactions, monitor performance, and access comprehensive insights.

paymentLinkGenerator.title: Payment Link Generator
paymentLinkGenerator.description: Generate payment links for your business with HoudiniSwap. Create secure, customizable payment links for your customers.

widget.title: HoudiniSwap Widget: Private Cross-Chain Swaps.
widget.description: Experience secure crypto anonymity with HoudiniSwap. Explore private transactions, fast cross-chain swaps, and enhanced privacy for your digital assets.
